To

              ,

              memory
              ,

text:
From
               
              false

              false
              ,

speaker: CRESSIDA
text:
Upbraid
               
              my

              !

              as

speaker: PANDARUS
text: Go to, a bargain made. Seal it, seal it. I’ll be

speaker: PANDARUS
text: the witness. Here I hold your hand, here my

speaker: PANDARUS
text: cousin’s. If ever you prove false one to another, since

speaker: PANDARUS
text: I have taken such pains to bring you together, let

speaker: PANDARUS
text: all pitiful goers-between be called to the world’s

speaker: PANDARUS
text: end after my name: call them all panders. Let all

speaker: PANDARUS
text: constant men be Troiluses, all false women Cressids,

speaker: PANDARUS
text: and all brokers-between panders. Say “Amen.”

speaker: TROILUS
text: Amen.

speaker: CRESSIDA
text: Amen.

speaker: PANDARUS
text: Amen. Whereupon I will show you a chamber

speaker: PANDARUS
text: with a bed, which bed, because it shall not

speaker: PANDARUS
text: speak of your pretty encounters, press it to death.

speaker: PANDARUS
text: Away.

speaker: PANDARUS
text:
And
               
              Cupid
               
              grant
               
              all

Bed

              .
